question: Jumlah rusuk pada bangun limas segitiga ada

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Jumlah rusuk, sisi dan sudut pada limas segitiga, limas segiempat dan limas segilima dan limas segienam adalah : Limas segitiga => 6 rusuk, 4 sisi dan 4 sudut (✔️) Limas segiempat => 8 rusuk, 5 sisi dan 5 sudut (✔️).

Semoga Bermanfaat Ya

related_questions.question: Tolong bantuannya dijawab dengan benar kakak kakak brainly​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

x = 4cm

PQ = 15cm

PR = 15cm

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

Cara mencari x :

2x + 7cm = 19cm - x

2x + 7cm - 19cm = - x

7cm - 19cm = -x -2x

- 12cm = - 3x

- 4cm = -x

4cm = x

jadi x = 4cm

Cara mencari PQ dan PR :

PQ = 2x + 7cm

= 2(4cm) + 7cm

= 8cm + 7cm

= 15cm

karena berbentuk persegi, jadi semua sisinya sama panjang jika 2 sisi 15cm maka dua sisi yang lain juga 15cm atau PQ = PR Jadi hasil PR juga 15cm

I recently moved to another town. I was very anxious on the first day I didn't know anyone. I went to the classroom and entered the room. While I was entering the room, I felt that everybody's eyes were on me I became even more anxious then. Fortunately, Mrs. Dian, the civic teacher, was right behind me. She greeted me and introduced me to the class. It turned out that my classmates were friendly. They showed me around and helped me get to know the school. At the end of the day, I was less and less anxious. I will always remember my first day at my school. Posted by Rafi

related_questions.question:
37. Diketahui skala suatu peta adalah 1. 1.250.000. Hitunglah    A. Jarak sebenarnya kota A dan B.jika jarak kota A dan B pada peta 6 cm

B. Jarak pada peta kota C dan D, jika jarak kota C dan D sebenarnya 150 km

tolong jawab kak​

answers.answer:
a. Jarak kota A dan B sebenarnya

=》Diket:

• Jarak pada peta = 6 cm

• Skala = 1 : 1.250.000

=》Jawab:

[tex]jarak \: sebenarnya = \frac{jarak \: pada \: peta}{skala} \\ = \frac{6}{ \frac{1}{1.250.000} } \\ = 6 \times 1.250.000 \\ = 7.500.000 \: cm \\ = 75 \: km[/tex]

b. Jarak kota C dan D pada peta

=》Diket:

• Jarak sebenarnya = 150 km = 15.000.000 cm

• Skala= 1 : 1.250.000

=》Jawab:

[tex]jarak \: pada \: peta = skala \times jarak \: sebenarnya \\ = \frac{1}{1.250.000} \times 15.000.000 \\ = \frac{15.000.000}{1.250.000} \\ = 12 \: cm[/tex]
